note.p: Physician. BA, Oxford (Trinity College), 1847; MA, 1851; MD, 1857. Curator of the museum, St George’s Hospital; assistant physician, 1857; lecturer on pathology from 1861; full physician, 1866–76; consulting physician, 1877. Active in several medical societies and an examiner in medicine at Oxford and Cambridge. Chiefly interested in nervous disorders; published several books and contributed to medical periodicals.
